Key.Original:
Get the Briefcase under your control. Force the Courier to join your side (his ACE-Interaction) and escort him or just kill him and take the Briefcase. However killing him will increase the Briefcase's tracking frequency.

We will give you an exfil location once you have the briefcase.
You have the briefcase. Move to the exfil position and defend it until your pick up arrives.
The enemy has the briefcase. Prevent their exfil.
